item.title: Immatics — (Senior) Manager Clinical Sciences
item.description:
Immatics combines the discovery of true targets for cancer immunotherapies with the development of the right T cell receptors with the goal of enabling a robust and specific T cell response against these targets. This deep know-how is the foundation for our pipeline of Adoptive Cell Therapies and TCR Bispecifics as we…
Location: Munich | Stack: biostatistics, clinical_ops, clinical_trials, communication, gcp, gcp_clinical, gxp, medical_writing, statistics

item.title: Immatics — Medical Monitor*
item.description:
ABOUT US Immatics is committed to making a meaningful impact on the lives of patients with cancer. We are the global leader in precision targeting of PRAME, a target expressed in more than 50 cancers. Our cutting-edge science and robust clinical pipeline form the broadest PRAME franchise with the most PRAME indication…
Location: Remote Work (Germany) | Stack: clinical_trials, communication, deviations, pv
